title: Didnt know where to put this maybe someone can help me.
body: So I've been playing games right getting levels and chests but ive encountered a problem, in over 2 levels I dont have enough blue essence for a 4800 champ.In over 10 chests Ive gotten only enough orange essence for one alistar skin and rerolled the rest for a galio skin.My question is why is it not rewarding to play the game and why do i have to use real currency to get new champions at an effective rate.

replies.body:
It really sucks you haven't been getting new champions quickly enough to feel like you're getting rewarded enough for just playing the game normally. With League being a free to play game, there wouldn't be much longevity if you were able to have all the content unlocked for free in a very short amount of time. 

Over time, you'll be gaining levels and getting chests which contain champion shards. Those you can use to keep getting blue essence which you can use to buy whichever champions you want. You don't have to spend real money, it only helps to unlock content like champions and skins immediately instead of earning it over time.
